block.p: Podcast: Scheduled to appear this week are Thomas Mallon on Thomas Hardy (in a 1913 photograph, above); Jim Harrison on Karl Shapiro; Dave Marsh on ''Something in the Air''; and Dwight Garner, senior editor, with best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus, the editor of the Book Review, is the host.
First Chapters: Excerpts from ''Arlington Park,'' by Rachel Cusk; ''John Osborne,'' by John Heilpern; and other books.
Links: Read reviews of the books listed in the Editors' Choice and Paperback Row features.
Forums: Respond to a review, discuss literary topics or join a monthly Reading Group.
